com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.actions

Interface Action

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAction, AbstractDynamicallyParameterisableAction, ContributingAction

    public interface Action
    The base building block of a template.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute(Context context, Writer writer)
      Executes this action.
      Action getParent()
      Returns the parent of this action.
      void setBody(ActionBody body)
      Sets the body of this action.
      void setParent(Action parent)

    • Method Detail

      • getParent

        Action getParent()
        Returns the parent of this action.
        Returns:
        this action's parent or null if this action does not have a parent

      • setParent

        void setParent(Action parent)
        Sets the action that contains this action.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent of this action

      • setBody

        void setBody(ActionBody body)
        Sets the body of this action.
        Parameters:
        body - the action body

      • execute

        void execute(Context context,
           Writer writer)
             throws AluminumException
        Executes this action.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to execute in
        writer - the writer to use
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when this action can't be executed
